Another option, though less common, is: **Ich bin ein Neuseeländer.** (masculine) or **Ich bin eine Neuseeländerin.** (feminine

Ich bin Omaner/Omanerin.

You use "Omaner" if you are male and "Omanerin" if you are female.  If you want a gender-neutral option, although less common, you could say: "Ich komme aus Oman" (I come from Oman).  Or, even more formally: "Ich bin omanischer Staatsbürger/omanische Staatsbürgerin" (I am an Omani citizen - masculine/feminine).

Another option, though less common, is:

Ich bin Sudanese/Sudanesin.
